sentence.english: She isn't afraid of speaking in public anymore.
sentence.spanish: Ella ya no tiene miedo de hablar en público.

sentence.english: Are they becoming more aggressive in their arguments?
sentence.spanish: ¿Se están volviendo más agresivos en sus discusiones?

sentence.english: He was alarmed by the sudden noise last night.
sentence.spanish: Él estaba alarmado por el ruido repentino anoche.

sentence.english: I'm not amazed by magic tricks anymore.
sentence.spanish: Ya no me asombran los trucos de magia.

sentence.english: Were you angry when you heard the news?
sentence.spanish: ¿Estabas enojado cuando escuchaste las noticias?

sentence.english: They are getting annoyed by the constant interruptions.
sentence.spanish: Ellos se están molestando por las constantes interrupciones.

sentence.english: Does she feel anxious before exams?
sentence.spanish: ¿Se siente ansiosa antes de los exámenes?

sentence.english: He wasn't astonished by the final result.
sentence.spanish: Él no estaba asombrado por el resultado final.

sentence.english: Are we getting bored with the same routine?
sentence.spanish: ¿Nos aburrimos con la misma rutina?

sentence.english: She doesn't feel bitter about her past experiences.
sentence.spanish: Ella no se siente amargada por sus experiencias pasadas.

sentence.english: I was feeling blue after the farewell party.
sentence.spanish: Me sentía triste después de la fiesta de despedida.

sentence.english: They are always cheerful in the morning.
sentence.spanish: Ellos siempre están alegres por la mañana.

sentence.english: Does he seem content with his new job?
sentence.spanish: ¿Parece contento con su nuevo trabajo?

sentence.english: She wasn't delighted with the surprise party.
sentence.spanish: Ella no estaba encantada con la fiesta sorpresa.

sentence.english: Are you feeling depressed about the situation?
sentence.spanish: ¿Te sientes deprimido por la situación?

sentence.english: He isn't disheartened by the initial failure.
sentence.spanish: Él no está desanimado por el fracaso inicial.

sentence.english: Were they disappointed with the exam results?
sentence.spanish: ¿Estaban decepcionados con los resultados del examen?

sentence.english: She is getting excited about her upcoming holiday.
sentence.spanish: Ella se está emocionando por sus próximas vacaciones.

sentence.english: Does he look exhausted after the long journey?
sentence.spanish: ¿Se ve agotado después del largo viaje?

sentence.english: They weren't fearful of the upcoming changes.
sentence.spanish: Ellos no tenían miedo de los próximos cambios.

sentence.english: Are you frightened of thunderstorms?
sentence.spanish: ¿Tienes miedo de las tormentas?

sentence.english: He is feeling frustrated with the slow progress.
sentence.spanish: Él se siente frustrado con el lento progreso.

sentence.english: Does she get furious when people are late?
sentence.spanish: ¿Se pone furiosa cuando la gente llega tarde?

sentence.english: I wasn't glad about the cancellation.
sentence.spanish: No estaba contento por la cancelación.

sentence.english: Are they happy with their new home?
sentence.spanish: ¿Están felices con su nuevo hogar?

sentence.english: She isn't heartbroken about the breakup anymore.
sentence.spanish: Ella ya no está afligida por la ruptura.

sentence.english: Were you horrified by the movie's ending?
sentence.spanish: ¿Quedaste horrorizado por el final de la película?

sentence.english: They are getting irritated by the constant noise.
sentence.spanish: Ellos se están irritando por el constante ruido.

sentence.english: Does he feel joyful during the holiday season?
sentence.spanish: ¿Se siente alegre durante la temporada navideña?

sentence.english: She wasn't feeling lonely in the new city.
sentence.spanish: Ella no se sentía sola en la nueva ciudad.

sentence.english: Are you mad at me for being late?
sentence.spanish: ¿Estás enfadado conmigo por llegar tarde?

sentence.english: He doesn't look miserable despite the bad weather.
sentence.spanish: Él no parece desdichado a pesar del mal tiempo.

sentence.english: Were they offended by the comment?
sentence.spanish: ¿Se sintieron ofendidos por el comentario?

sentence.english: She is outraged by the unfair decision.
sentence.spanish: Ella está indignada por la decisión injusta.

sentence.english: Does he seem overjoyed with the news?
sentence.spanish: ¿Parece extremadamente feliz con la noticia?

sentence.english: They weren't overwhelmed by the workload.
sentence.spanish: Ellos no estaban abrumados por la carga de trabajo.

sentence.english: Are you being pessimistic about the future?
sentence.spanish: ¿Estás siendo pesimista sobre el futuro?

sentence.english: He was feeling sad after watching the film.
sentence.spanish: Él se sentía triste después de ver la película.

sentence.english: I'm not scared of trying new things.
sentence.spanish: No tengo miedo de probar cosas nuevas.

sentence.english: Were they shocked by the sudden announcement?
sentence.spanish: ¿Estaban sorprendidos por el anuncio repentino?

sentence.english: She looks sorrowful today.
sentence.spanish: Ella parece afligida hoy.

sentence.english: Does he get stressed during exam periods?
sentence.spanish: ¿Se estresa durante los períodos de exámenes?

sentence.english: They weren't surprised by the test results.
sentence.spanish: Ellos no estaban sorprendidos por los resultados de la prueba.

sentence.english: Are you feeling tired after the long day?
sentence.spanish: ¿Te sientes cansado después del largo día?

sentence.english: He is feeling uncomfortable in the crowded room.
sentence.spanish: Él se siente incómodo en la habitación llena de gente.

sentence.english: Does she seem unhappy with her current situation?
sentence.spanish: ¿Parece infeliz con su situación actual?

sentence.english: I wasn't upset about the cancelled plans.
sentence.spanish: No estaba molesto por los planes cancelados.

sentence.english: Are they worried about the upcoming deadline?
sentence.spanish: ¿Están preocupados por la próxima fecha límite?
